dt: {bc}relating to, based on, or agreeable to reason {bc}{sx|reasonable||}
{bc}involving only multiplication, division, addition, and subtraction and only a finite number of times
{bc}relating to, consisting of, or being one or more rational numbers

et: Middle English {it}racional{/it}, from Anglo-French {it}racionel{/it}, from Latin {it}rationalis{/it}, from {it}ration-, ratio{/it}
shortdef: relating to, based on, or agreeable to reason : reasonable
involving only multiplication, division, addition, and subtraction and only a finite number of times
